alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 1:54AM EDT until April 23 at 2:15AM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN HOUGHTON COUNTY... At 154 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dollar Bay, or near Houghton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Houghton, Laurium, Chassell, Lake Linden, Hubbell, Houghton County Airport, Dollar Bay, The Lower Entrance of Portage Canal, Jacobsville and Rabbit Bay. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
